ygData.subject: Forces
ygData.msgSnippet: (Thanks for reminding me, Yan, but my guys aren t hovering, they re all going full speed northeast so they re no where near the blast area of the puny weapon

(Thanks for reminding me, Yan, but my guys aren't hovering, they're all going 
full speed northeast so they're no where near the blast area of the puny 
weapon :p)


Unicron/Vehement/Sun Crusher/Reflector/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw/The
Protectobots/Shockwave:



Unicron kept flying at top speed as did his warriors, feeling a small amount 
of his energy being drained, though every second it was being drained less 
and less.  He raised an arm, launching another ES-seeking missile and stopped 
firing immediately after that, the ancient robot out of firing range, unless 
the enemies pursued them.

---

Vehement dived down in the air, avoiding the missiles but two shots striking 
him.  One in an undamaged part of his robe that absorbed the blast, the other 
hitting him in a gap of the material, getting past some damaged armor and 
deactivating some circuitry that wasn't vital.

He looked back, firing off ten rapid optic blasts at Killfest, raising an 
arm, but followed Unicron as he was out of firing range of his enemies.

---

Sun Crusher saw two incoming missiles fired off five rapid optic blasts on an 
intercept course with one of the missiles and ducked under one, not knowing 
it was ES-seeking, and yelled out as it exploded against his back.  He 
cursed, raising an arm and launching off two energy-signature seeking 
missiles down at Greven, continuing at maximum speed in pursuit of Unicron.

---

Reflector's back was to EndBringer, but his advanced scanners detected four 
projectiles heading towards him and he stopped, firing off ten rapid optic 
blasts, only intercepting three missiles, the other getting close to his 
knees, the Brotherhood 'bot firing another optic blast, the exploding missile 
only three feet from him and sending a nice amount of shrapnel and flames 
into his abdomen and legs.  As if nothing happened, he raised a wrist and 
launched a single energy-signature seeking missile at EndBringer's sternum.

Turning back around, he blasted off into the air gaining altitude and in 
pursuit of Unicron.

---

Demon Wulf watched the three other Protectobots arrived and the Vok warrior 
growled of irritation.  Raising his sword, he fired off five rapid optic 
blasts at Blades' left knee, taking a page out of Groove's book.

---

Flesh Ripper fired off a single optic blast off at the incoming charge, 
missing and letting out as the explosive went off in between his feet and 
sent him in the air a few feet, crashing down onto his chest.

---

Dark Claw armed the two double-barrelled laser cannons on top of his current 
mode, firing bolt from each, two at Hot Spot's sternum and two at First Aid's 
left shoulder.

---

Hot Spot felt two burning beams stab into his sternum, the force knocking him 
flat to his back, a small charred out hole in that area.  He got up 
painfully, transforming to his blue fire truck mode and driving at 80 MPH at 
Dark Claw.

---

Groove got up slowly, taking out his twin cannon, arming freezing gases and 
started a painful jog for Flesh Ripper.

---

Blades rolled to the left, crashing to his shoulder in mid roll and then 
getting back up to his feet, firing off three bolts from his photon pistol at 
Demon Wulf, leaping into the air and transforming into his Apache mode, 
arming his cannons.

---

First Aid felt two blasts burn into his shoulder, sending him into a slight 
spin, the robot falling to a knee.  "Slag it!  This isn't happening again." 
he said, getting up and firing a welding laser beam at Dark Claw.

---

Streetwise slowly pushed himself up, but fell back down to his chest.  
"Shi..." he coughed up some mech-fluid, transforming to his police car mode 
and slowly headed for Demon Wulf, gaining speed quickly.

---

Shockwave landed in biped mode behind First Aid, raising his right hand, 
which held a missile launcher, and fired off a rocket at the back of First 
Aid's pelvis.
